Containers.Name: Bloom-Website
Containers.Description:
Official website for Bloom - a tactical extraction FPS set in a quarantined city-zone reshaped by alien "Monolith" phenomena. Features development progress, concept art gallery, lore & world-building, and technical milestones. Built with modern responsive design and optimized for performance.
Key Features: - Responsive design for all devices - Progress tracking with real development metrics - Concept art showcase of AI-generated assets - Rich lore and world-building content - Technical milestone documentation - Nginx-based with security headers and caching - Health check monitoring included
Default port 2161 matches the game's timeline year (2161 post-Cascade).
